attributes.action: do everything in his power to get the original Landyzone up and running again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after some low life scummy hacker type destroyed landyzone and blew up the gaylander arms we have had to put up wiff some old tempoary site. its just not good enough, something needs to be done about it

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
